price: I dok su oni spavali, nju od Gospodara tvoga zadesi nesreća
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
